Warhammer 40,000 Balance Dataslate - Spring 2025

Published: March 15, 2025

The latest Balance Dataslate brings significant changes to competitive play.

Key Changes

  • Aeldari: Points increases across multiple units
  • Space Marines: Gladius Task Force detachment rule adjusted
  • Necrons: Hypercrypt Legion gets new ability
